record.question: "Did you have any financial disputes with Jonathan Blackwood?"
record.feedback: "Yes, we had a disagreement about the artifact's value, but I was just trying to make ends meet with the financial pressures of my business."

record.question: "Where were you at 8pm last night?"
record.feedback: "I was at my apartment, but I can't confirm if anyone else was there."

record.question: "Did you have access to the antique brass candlestick in the manor?"
record.feedback: Yes, I had access to the antique brass candlestick as it was part of my renovation work in the study, and I moved it for safety during the day—its presence there was entirely routine and unrelated to any suspicious activity.

record.question: "Did you know Jonathan Blackwood had a habit of keeping valuable artifacts in his study?"
record.feedback: Yes, I was aware that Jonathan's study housed his prized artifacts, which he regarded as the pinnacle of his life's work.
